      • editTaskById

        public void editTaskById​(int id)
        Editing Task values by entering new values from the screen to update them! If some values want to be unedited,just skip entering new values and it will take it as a null! If the value is null (no entered values), it will keep the original value!
        Parameters:
        id - is the ID for wanted editing value entered by the user
